title: History
subtitle: Logs of the storage deal proposals received (last 3 months).

table.noMatch: Your search did not match any storage proposals.

active.tooltip: The deal is currently active on-chain.

accepted.tooltip: The deal has been accepted by CIDgravity. Awaiting publication.

sealingDuration.title: Sealing duration
sealingDuration.tooltip: The average time for storage providers to process a deal, from its blockchain publication to full onboarding.

overallDuration.title: Overall duration
overallDuration.tooltip: The average duration from when a deal is sent to the storage provider until full onboarding, covering all stages: Acceptance, Downloading, Packing, and Sealing. This KPI specifically applies to deals using CIDgravity.

error.generic: Unable to load data. Please try again later or contact the CIDgravity team.
